summary: Adds a set of Nazgul-inspired light armor to the game.
descriptionHtml:
[b]I got a request to finally release this set, so here it is.[/b]
[img=center]http://i.imgur.com/zgcDlXF.jpg[/img]
[Original WIP Screenshot]

[heading]IMPORTANT[/heading]
The way this mod achieves the headless/faceless hood is similar to the headless glitch that occurs when wearing Dragon Priest masks and certain hoods. [u]If the armor\'s head/hood disappears, just reload the save, or unequip the armor, quicksave and quickload.[/u] I don\'t know of a way to stop this from happening, sorry about that.

[heading]DETAILS[/heading]
The armor can be crafted (and tempered) with the [b]Advanced Armors[/b] perk, under the [b]Daedric[/b] category. An enchanted variant is also craftable, which has the Ebony Mail enchant.
The set is considered light armor, and [b]supports both genders[/b]. [However the hood is not compatible with Argonians or Khajiit.]

[heading]RECOMMENDED MODS[/heading]
The cloaks in the screenshots are the Black Burlap cloaks from Noodles\' [b]Cloaks of Skyrim[/b] mod. [http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092/]

The Nazgul Greatsword is from Isilmeriel\'s [b]LOTR Weapons Collection[/b] [http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5727/]

The mods are highly recommended to complete the look.
